Title: 39541 - # Tips for Summer Party Décor
Direction: 500 words. Give 3-6 decorating tips for someone who is planning a party this summer. Talk about things like table settings, fresh flowers, strung lights and themed party ideas. Your target audience is interested in DIY and decorating. You can place your target URL by suggesting using strung lights to decorate. You can mention that lights like these can be used all year round, not just during the holiday season.
